column2: deep dish pizza is a little hyped up.  as a fan of neapolitan pizza
column3: i can't say i was completely in love with lou malnati's
column4: but i will bump up the rating for their salad
column5: service and ambiance.  i also can't say if this is the chicago's best since i didn't care to try other deep dish pizza places after having my first bite here.
